newsitem.title: INDIA: CRICKET-SOUTH AFRICA 179 FOR EIGHT AT LUNCH.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-SOUTH AFRICA 179 FOR EIGHT AT LUNCH.

text.p: South Africa, chasing a victory target of 461, were 179 for eight in their second innings at lunch on the fifth day of the third and final cricket test against India on Thursday.
Scores: India 237 and 400-7 declared. South Africa 177 and 179-8 at lunch (H.Cronje 50, L.Klusener 34 not out, A.Hudson 31, S.Joshi 3-66, J.Srinath 2-38).
